comments:

The dialog in Eclipse and this log entry reappears endlessly when i (try to) 
confirm the dialog.

Our HATS testers have also reported this problem running our HATS plugin on RAD 
V6 (Eclipse3.01). Is there an update on a resolution to this?

Defect Description:
       Steps to reproduce:
              1. Create a project 
              2. Open host terminal
              3. Click "Create Screen Customization"
              4. Create screen customization using defaults.
              5. Delete project (I did not close any windows before deleting).
       Problems:
              swt.SWTException: Widget is disposted is written to log 4 times

Response from HATS development: 
This is being caused by a call to code that has been 
rendered obsolete by the closing of the project. The specific
call is and must be expected to complete and cannot
be subject to verification. 
  This error should be pursued through the eclipse
organization if you feel it is an issue.

Anybody figured out what is happening.. why are all these errors being 
generated to the log? Any chance of a fix in RAD V6 before GM?

Marking as WORKSFORME. Please reopen if this is a Eclipse issue but it looks
like it is a RAD issue
